lexUnit.name: leprosy.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a contagious bacterial disease that affects the skin, mucous membranes, and nerves, causing discoloration and lumps on the skin and, in severe cases, disfigurement and deformities

sentence.text: A French study showed that nicotinamide , a member of the B-complex of vitamins that prevents the disease pellagra in man ( see Chapter 13 ) , had some activity against the development of leprosy in rodents .
